About this blog

This website is still a work in progress. It was created with Jekyll, a Ruby static site generator. It has free hosting (via Github) and is kind of fun. Check out the site to learn more and set up your own Jekyll blog. You don’t need to have too much technical knowledge—just a very basic understanding of HTML, Ruby, Github, and most importantly, Google search.
